comments.body: The file header incorrectly references 'SparseVector.cs' instead of the actual filename 'Calculator.cs'. This inconsistency may lead to confusion regarding file ownership and purpose. Please update the header to reflect the correct file name and license details.

The use of double.Parse on the input buffer without any validation can cause runtime exceptions (e.g., invalid format or possible division by zero in the '/' case). Consider using double.TryParse and adding appropriate checks to ensure the input is valid before performing arithmetic operations.
